duties_responsibilities.duty: Define, plan and execute the platform product vision, strategy and roadmap.
Engage with customers, understand their needs, and build products that bring value and create meaningful impact.
Lead market research and competitive landscape analysis to assess customer business and technical needs.
Define metrics and set targets to constantly measure the success of products.
Foster product relationships and partnerships with relevant industry players.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in related field (Master's preferred)
